---
title: 'Humana First Round Report'
author: "Edison Gu"
date: "03/01/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
# library(alr4)
# library(GGally)
# library(broom)
# library(ggpubr)
demo <- read_excel("Humana Case 2020 Q1 -- Data.xlsx", 
     sheet = "Demographics", col_types = c("text", 
         "numeric", "numeric", "numeric", 
         "numeric", "text", "text", "text", 
         "numeric", "numeric", "text", "text"))

claims <- read_excel("Humana Case 2020 Q1 -- Data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Claims")

er <- read_excel("Humana Case 2020 Q1 -- Data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "ER Utilization")

pcp <- read_excel("Humana Case 2020 Q1 -- Data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "PCP Visits")

hospital <- read_excel("Humana Case 2020 Q1 -- Data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Hospital Admissions")

rx <- read_excel("Humana Case 2020 Q1 -- Data.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Rx Utilization")

claims = claims %>% mutate(id = as.character(id))
er = er %>% mutate(id = as.character(id))
pcp = pcp %>% mutate(id = as.character(id))
hospital = hospital %>% mutate(id = as.character(id))
rx = rx %>% mutate(id = as.character(id))
```
